1.content:
In the world of ÜberMass. There is a special company named ÜberMass, that specialises in the development, and sales of special products that enable rapid, and in some cases, extreme growth. With a solid reputation for high reliability and strong sales, this company dominates its market.

Within this world, there are many different kinds of anthropomorphic beings that live happily enough side by side, even if the odd exception here and there do exist. And to support this, various industries have been created to support the many groups. From the small Foxes and Cats that don't get much taller than 170cm, to the much larger Dinosaurs and Dragons that can reach over 420cm in height. But for all of them, any day can be quite a spectacular one for them.

So the only reals questions that are asked are: For who, will the day be such a spectacular one for?



Today, it will be......



Vincent Schmidt - The Founder, Owner, and President of ÜberMass Incorporated. A 205cm Windragon of a light, yet strong build. With silver-grey fur, black feathered wings, very long brown hair that reached halfway down his back, and almost always seen wearing his trademark red overcoat with black, fingerless gloves. If he isn't working at his company, you'll usually find him alongside...

Terra Crescent - A 190cm Gila Monster with emerald green scales for most of her body except for gold-yellow scales over her front. Slender, except for an impressive bust, while loving to wear tight clothing. She is the girlfriend of Vincent and often likes to "help" him with testing out some of his products when not at the gym she owns.

Dmitri Healey - A 351cm - when standing, but over 750cm from snout to tail - Asian-Type Dragon who's very slim for his height. Deep crimson scales for the most part, with dark chestnut-colour for the scutes. Very strong in spite of his apparent weak build - think Drako from the TMNT 2K3 Series - and willing to use it when required to. Works as head of security at ÜberMass, but has been known to work for testing when needed.

Of course, there are plenty of others to choose from, all part of the fabric of this story.

A/N - To clarify an important point here, this world is quite unlike ours in terms of Geology and Orbital Nature. Specifically the world inhabited here is not what would be considered a Planet, but rather a Blue Moon. That is, it's an Earth-like world that orbits a Parent Gas Giant Planet which in turn orbits its parent stars. The plural there is because this is a Triple-Star System with the inhabited world maintaining a Stable Orbit around the Binary Pair (one at 0.74 Solar Mass and the other is 0.37) within the Habitable Zone, while the third Sun (0.43 Solar Mass) orbits the lot at an immense distance where it's influence is weak at best.

This results in the inhabitants being able to see an orange and red star in the day sky and a very bright star during their nights. And their day involves completing one full day/night cycle which is directly tied to their orbit around the Parent Gas Giant, taking about 14 days here on Earth to complete.
1.title: The BIG-inning

11.content:
Vincent Schmidt - The Founder, Owner, and President of ÜberMass Incorporated. A 205cm Windragon of a light, yet strong build. With silver-grey fur, black feathered wings, long feathered ears very long brown hair that reached halfway down his back, and almost always seen wearing his trademark red overcoat with black, finger-less gloves. Though right now, since he'd woken up not that long ago, this was not the case at the moment since he was getting dressed after a long shower. Soon enough though, he was attired in his usual gear of black boots, dark blue jeans, light grey shirt with the top few buttons undone. And of course, his red overcoat and gloves.

Right now, he was just finishing his coffee as he checked the time. 10:30am. Late, but since his factory and development labs were closed today, that was a luxury that he could afford.

So what he asked himself was. 'What should I do today?'

He knew Terra would be at the gym, that still being open today, he could always visit her there and have some fun. However, there were a few things that he felt he could catch up with at his main Office, which was located in the main development lab, a ways out of town. Then again, there were also a few places for entertainment that he'd either always wanted to see, or had not seen in a long while. He could even take a quiet stroll around the Park or Nature Paths that were nearby. And, of course, with a small stock of his own growth products here, there was always that for some personal enjoyment.

Decisions, decisions......
11.title: Vincent Schmidt

12.content:
Terra Crescent isn't what most people would refer to as "pretty". Standing at an impressive 190cm in height, she often found herself standing taller than many males. Furthermore, she was also hampered by her hairlessness, not bald or shaven (which was a style that could be found in certain cultures) but completely hairless. Granted, she was a lizard so it was quite normal to be lacking it. Yet that didn’t stop her from learning the hard way that many men found this to be a turn-off.

What Terra did have in her favour though, was her build. For her height, she was slim, almost to the point of being athletic with hardly any fat on her body. To add to this, in front of her chest, she carried an impressively large pair of firm, yet squishy D-Cups which appeared larger thanks to her build. Something she would take advantage of by wearing tight-fitting clothing that could reveal a teasing amount of her cleavage while still retaining modesty. V-Necks being a particular favourite of hers, which could send men into lampposts or have them receive a jealous scolding from wives and girlfriends on a good day. Incidentally, this was a similar reason as to why she almost never wore a bra, though she would claim that this was because they couldn’t fit her right.

Her scales came in two colours. The majority, a rich green-teal, while the belly, undertail, inner thighs, neck, lower snout, and her ample breasts came in a soft yellow-amber.

For Terra, her main employment (and thus income) came from the Holiday Home that she had inherited from her Great Aunt when she had died, which she would travel to shortly before the start of each holiday season in order to make certain that everything was still in order and ready for the next round of guests. Located several hours drive away, in an idyllic mountainous terrain, it was a great place for those who wished to be away from the hustle and bustle of City Life. Though she had been known to make use of it herself, usually when she and Vincent were able to have time off together.

While she wasn't at work she would live with Vincent, and be a regular visitor to his main offices, and, at times, she would be willing to help him test out some of his test products to assess their worth.

Personality-wise. Terra Crescent is and adventurous, curious type, with a willingness to try out new things. With a friendly nature and a tendency to look on the lighter side of things. However, she is known to act on impulses without taking the time to think things through, and has been seen to be a bit of a ditz and being quite gullible. On top of that, she does become bored rather easily.

But what is she going to do right now?
12.title: Terra Crescent

121.content:
For Terra Crescent, this was the beginning of what was always a long, torturous ordeal. A full hour-and-a-quarter (Note that that’s really 4.2 hours by Earth Time) of long, lonely roads that were almost straight, save for the occasional turn here and there, and with only one station that she could get a signal for throughout. The result being that if she wanted to, she could put the cruise control on and just hold the wheel steady with her hands.

One-and-a-quarter hours, along barren roads, with…
121.title: Head to the Holiday Home

1211.content:
One-and-a-quarter hours, along barren roads, all by herself.

She sighed dully, having done this several times before, it was something that she’d become used to. Not that the experience offered her any help with the boredom that plagued her. Turning off the radio, not willing to listen to the latest generic 15-minute teen idol, leaving her with just the throaty rumbling of the car engine.

While Terra did see driving as little more than a means to an end, she did know enough to know that she needed one that could handle the job. That’s why her current car was an oil-burning Skoda Yeti, painted an ashen-black metallic. The four-wheel drive and torquey engine made sure that it could handle the last portion of her trip, which was a good 15-20 minutes of dirt road, and the black paint hid the dirt it would build up there easily enough. While being able to remove the back seats and leaving them behind made certain that she could carry a lot with her, although all she had with her for this trip was a satchel bag resting on the passenger seat to her left. It was all she needed to carry her essentials, most of the rest kept at the Holiday Home.

The only real entertainment she had with her were the rains. The larger Sun was only just beginning it’s slow climb up the horizon, the smaller, redder one starting to cede to it’s stronger light - even if both were being hidden somewhat by the thick, dark clouds. This effect made this one of the two times in the day when the rains were most likely to come, and it came hard.

This meant she had been forced to slow down, from 100 to just 75 to be certain that she‘d be able to keep control in these conditions. And that meant that she’d be in this car, driving for longer than normal.

“This is torture.” She whined to herself.

And the weather was doing more than simply slowing her down, it also served to discourage people from taking to the roads. She had yet to pass even a single other vehicle on her journey.

To quell a slight itch on her side, she reached a hand under her belted jacket and jumper to get her claws to it. For this trip, she was wearing a wide-oval neck jumper that was the same amber-yellow as her belly scales, with plain black trousers of the same material that she had on for comfort, complemented by her belted jacket whose colour matched her trousers. She liked this type since not only were they comfortable to wear, but also offered a good amount of stretch to them, meaning she could buy them a size too small and have them fit her snugly.

But having reached under them like that, the jacket and jumper had been pulled up and now the bottom of her right breast peeked out. This brought a giggle from Terra, who finally had something that broke the monotony of the otherwise painfully dull drive.

“Careful now.” She teasingly scolded herself. “Can’t have you flashing herself in public now, can we?”

Which actually brought a mischievous thought to her. Thanks to the heavy rain, there was nobody else on the roads, effectively giving her the freedom to do whatever she wanted here!

And that brought another wicked thought into her mind, reaching over into her satchel bag, she fished around for a moment, before her hand caught its target. A pair of small bottled drinks that when she risked a moment to look at their labels, read:

ÜberMass Fast-Gro

ÜberMass Long-Gro

Special drinks made by her beloved Vince’s company, ÜberMass Incorporated, and would provide a special stimulation to the body, upping the height of whoever drank it by nearly two and a half, and ramping up their muscle mass even more so. She had them with her in case, while alone in the mountains, she needed to do some heavy lifting, or just have some fun with it.

While both would begin the process within minutes, the first one would take her to peak growth in a minute tops, and last maybe an hour-and-a half. The second one, the Long-Gro variety needed over an hour to hit the peak but would hold that peak for over four times longer.

Either way, it would definitely make the journey far more exiting for her, if she were a giantess for it. And no-one being around to see it would make it safer, operating a motor vehicle while a giantess may not be illegal, but it was certainly something that was severely frowned upon.

Then again, if she was going to take it, she’d wind up losing her clothes, and have to do the drive naked. Why could she not do just that? Take off her clothes and drive in nothing but her scales?

With the bottles sitting on her lap, Terra pondered over her options, before making up her mind.
1211.title: Alone on a lonely road

choices: Take the rest of the Drink
12111.content:
In the end, she had already decided what she was going to do. Slipping the first drink back into the satchel, she popped the other one open and took a swig of the liquid, the sweet juice tickling her mouth ever so slightly.

“Ooh Terra Crescent. You are such a naughty girl.” She mock-scolded herself for what she was doing as she re-sealed the drink and sat it next to her satchel bag.

Now she was forced to wait for it to take effect, and with nothing good on the radio either. Not because there were no shortage of stations, but because there was only the one station that could be kept from the City all the way to the Holiday Home, and all it usually played were generic Teen Pop Idols or the like. Certainly not what Terra wanted to endure.

Some elation ran through her when she saw the sign noting the turnoff from her current Route L10 to the Route K09 that she wanted to go on was just 5 Km away. Once she reached it, time-wise that would mean that she had made it to the halfway point, with half the time left on tarmac roads then the last part would be primarily dirt road.

Now though, the first tingling sensations ran through her, signalling the start of the growth.

“Mmmmmmmmm……” She moaned out with the euphoric pleasure that washed over her as the drink began its work.

With the waves of ecstatic pleasure, her body began to swell out. Limbs becoming thick with heavy muscle that were beginning to press out against their tightening fabric confines. She was dimly aware of the sound of popping and tearing, her jacket, not having the same stretch as her jumper and trousers had had its buttons torn off by her enlarging breasts and torso while the right sleeve was being pulled away at the shoulder seam, her biceps pushing out against them.

Barely able to keep her eyes open with the pleasurable feelings that she experienced, Terra could feeling her legs bending notably as they lengthened along with the rest of her, as the car’s interior seemed to become smaller to her.

Finally, she managed to pull her senses together as the euphoria wore off, and not a moment too soon either. She was almost at the turnoff now! And now she had a brand new problem of her own making, with her greater size and thicker, more muscular build, she found that she was having trouble getting her foot off the accelerator and onto the brake, somehow managing to do so.

“Ah. Forgot about that.” Terra spoke to herself as she had to do a sort of fast-shuffle with the steering wheel to make the turn thanks to her larger breasts being somewhat obstructing now.

In truth, her clothes were becoming restrictive now, she normally liked to wear them a size smaller than she should since that allowed for a snug fit given their stretchy nature. The penalty for this was that they had little give in them for her growing body. She found herself grateful that - as usual - she had neglected to put on a bra or panties, that would just be too painful for her to bear had she done so. Terra was also grateful for the fact that her heels were in the passenger side where she’d left them just before setting off.

That said, things were very uncomfortable for her now, and she was soon forced to find a lay-by where she could pull over and bring the car to a halt.

Now at a stop, she could slowly, carefully work her arm between her legs to get to the lever beneath her seat, sliding it back to its farthest point. That was better with her legs no longer needing to be bent painfully to work the pedals, and more space between her and the steering wheel meant they weren’t brushing against it now.

The lack of motion also meant that Terra could now get a proper look at herself. She could see her swollen biceps as she flexed them, and it was not just her biceps had swollen. Muscles were forming into definitive shapes on her forearms as well, which had slid out from her sleeves.

“This, this is just too cool!” She squealed with a slight giggle, that giggle causing her boobs to bounce slightly, even with the jumper and jacket - which was held tight only by the belt that remained on - pressing them in.

Giving the left one a squeeze with her hand, pleased that they were still soft and squishy even with their increased size. And she could imagine that her legs were in the same state as her arms as her free left hand ran over the side of her left leg, confirmed when she managed to crane her neck over to see them past her swollen boobs.

Her eyes caught the drink, the Fast-Gro that had put her into this glorious situation. This made Terra think about finishing the drink, and really getting some size and muscle packed on! However, doing so would make it next to impossible, if not impossible, to drive, so she could be better off just leaving herself at this size and driving on, even if that would be duller - though not as dull as driving at her normal size at least. Then she looked at her clothes, stretched almost painfully, and the jacket was torn now, perhaps she would be better off getting them off first.

“C’mon Terra, make up your mind already.” She impatiently demanded of herself.
12111.title: Fast Growth is Good Growth

1213.content:
Travelling with Terra is one of three of her friends, who she’s decided to hire for this holiday season to both help with the workload and keep her from being too lonely, given that Vincent’s work requires him to stay by the City for most of the year.

So which of the three might be with her?

1) Karol Schroeder - A 175 cm silver-grey wolf with C-Cup breasts that aren’t large, but still quite noticeable. Usually wears loose dresses as they aren’t too demanding on her fur-covered body. Likes to take things on the wild side and have fun. Sexually active and harbours a secret crush on Terra.

2) Lana Lane - A 231 cm chestnut shire draught horse with a muscular build and breasts proportional to a mid-D Cup. Tank-tops or t-shirts with cut-off shorts or jeans is a favoured dress for her, as well as sports bra and shorts though she does have other options for when the occasion requires it. Likes to make her work more fun if she can get away with it, and isn’t above using her bulk to get her way.

3) Victoria “Vicky” White - A 180 cm green snake with a love of leather and latex, and growing herself out of it. B-Cup breasts, but almost a C, at least until she makes herself bigger. Very “adventurous” and has been in trouble on the odd occasion for her tendency to enact on her fetishes without warning.
1213.title: ...she's got some company for the ride

12131.content:
“God this is boring.” Karol whined as she and Terra were driving along the barren Route L10.

Not surprising for this time of the year when the Holiday Season was still a while off. Soon these roads would be packed with holiday-goers bit for now, it felt like the Grand Voyager was the only thing on the tarmac.

Terra had selected this car for two reasons. One, its sheer size made carrying the luggage she sometimes needed to stock up the place with on occasion a lot easier.

Two. Despite her misadventure with accidentally growing herself in the last car, ruining it, she found that the act was very pleasant, she did enjoy it while it had lasted.

And three, this car was a lot larger than the last one so with the greater dimensions and much greater load limits, it could handle her doing such a thing again.

As usual, the unneeded back seats had been left behind, with the stowage spaces used to hold what they were bringing with them. Mostly Karol’s stuff since Terra kept a number of changes of clothes and other things at the Holiday Home, meaning less to cart back and forth.

And this time, she would have some help running the Holiday Home she managed during the Season having convinced Karol Schroeder to come with her as an assistant. Not that it made the journey any less dull than it normally was with 43:34 being the only consistently held station for the entire run and she had already grown sick of the latest teen trash, for now, the radio was silent.

“Well, you did agree to come with me, so you’d better be able to deal with this.” Terra countered Karol’s complaint. “And besides, things’ll be better once we’re off the road.” If there was one thing helping Terra deal with the tedious journey, it was having someone else around to complain about it.

“I know that, but jeez! How do you cope with this?”

“I have ways.” Terra replied simply recalling her previous accidental adventure when she hadn‘t read the can label and made herself a muscled-up giantess, and the one before when she‘d done more than half the drive naked.

“Okay.” Karol answered with a slight smirk. “But why the getup?” She referred to Terra already being in her business clothes of deep v-neck sweater that gave just the right amount of cleavage, belted jacket and trousers.

“They’re comfortable to drive in. And besides, sun’s not been up long.” She was half-right. While the smaller red one had been up for a while, the larger orange one had only recently starting its slow climb up the horizon.

“Fur. Works wonders.” Karol teased, leaning back with just her knee-length dress wrapped around her own body, a styled belt holding it in slightly above the waist.

“Scales. Low-maintenance.” Terra returned the friendly fire before licking the rim of her mouth. “Thirsty. Mind getting a drink?”

“Sure.” Karol replied happily, having something to do that meant moving around, if only to the satchel by her feet where she rummaged around in it for a time before taking a can out and handing it over.

“Thanks.” Terra said as she popped it open, draining the can of its bubbly liquid before handing it back over to Karol who was halfway through her own drink.

They continued to banter for a while, talking about the Holiday Home, what to expect, what needed to be done before it was opened for the Season, about Vincent who Terra kept speaking of with deep affection.

Finally, the turnoff from Route L10 to Route K09 came into view, the point where the journey would be half done. It was at this point that Terra…
12131.title: Friends help the miles pass by

14.content:
Well there is Plucky Duck, who's story can be followed.

Though there are plenty of others to follow as well:

Othello Drake, a heavily muscled 305cm black and grey Dragon who works at the Übermass Development Lab situated some way out of town. Always wears the Lab Coat while at work, but anything he wears tends to threaten to tear itself free even before he tries to grow! Which happens a lot as he does love to test his products on himself.

Zack McConach, a 290cm black Wolf, also of a powerful, muscular build, and boyfriend of Othello. Enjoys frequenting the gyms to maintain his physique, though he’s willing to use special products when he really wants to get BIG! He is more than willing to volunteer himself for product testing at Übermass to bring in more money for himself and Othello, while enjoying it at the same time.

Lorenzo Buchanan, a 318cm Dragon with titanium-silver scales for most of his body with a lighter shade of silver for his wing membranes and front. Owns a rather successful Internet Firm which has made him a self-made billionaire which permits him to enjoy the finer things in life. Is quite a womaniser and is a regular user of Übermass Growth Products.
14.title: Another Male

choices: Grab a monster sized bite or two to eat.
141.content:
Plucky duck was just your typical anthromorphic normal sized green duck who was out and about somewhere in acme acres until some ubermass products caught his attention.

Plucky duck: Ubermass eh? you know i've always wanted to be the biggest duck in all of acme acres he said to himself as he purchased some of the ubermass products and then went home to see if it would really make him become the biggest duck in all of acme acres.

At that moment Plucky duck had finally gotten home and decided to try some of ubermass's products, but before he did he took off his white shirt so it wouldn't rip when he finally becomes supersized.

And so plucky began chugging down all of the ubermass beverage until there was nothing left and of course burped like no tomorrow.

Plucky duck: *urp* excuse me he said.

Immediately Plucky began growing at an alarming rate as he started taking up so much space in his house until he finally smashed the roof of his house and then looked down at everything that was now smaller than he was and noticed something was different about himself.

Now Plucky was 50ft tall and couldn't help but see the city of acme acres in the distance. What would Plucky duck do now that he was 50ft tall?
141.title: Follow Plucky Duck

145.content:
Well here are another set of options:

Joseph "Joe" Kinneas, a 274cm dark green Crocodile. A long-haul trucker by profession, with a reputation for getting the job done regardless of whatever mishaps may occur. Especially if it's caused by his own love of Growth. Being skilled in the use of, and licensed for Double Road Trains & Oversize Loads allows Joe to manage some particularly difficult tasks that he might have to tackle. All the while making sure he can enjoy his hobby of cranking up his size and build.

Jason Parvotti, a 183cm cream-white and sandy-brown Snake, lean but fit. City Office Trader with a good money-making reputation. Loves to grow and get out of his clothes, to the point where he almost never wears anything in his home. Also a regular visitor of nudist resorts and growth resorts.
145.title: Another Male

1452.content:
He woke up when the blinds opened on their timed command, allowing sunlight to strike him. Stretching himself as he yawned deeply, he then rubbed his eyes while sliding his feet out from under the covers. He continued his stretching once he had the covers off and was standing, revealing the fact that he'd been sleeping completely in the Nude - which happened to be something he did all the time - with his cream-white and sandy-brown scales completely open to the elements.

After he'd finished this, his next act was to get a good shower to help finish with getting himself bright and alert, not the easiest thing considering his lengthy tail - close to one-and-a-half times the length of his legs - did take up quite a bit of space in the shower cubicle. But he managed it well enough, and was soon drying himself off as he began to think about breakfast.

So where is he?
1452.title: The Start of Jason Parvotti's Day

1453.content:
Well what about this pair?

Sabin Kazuki, a 178cm lizard. Dark green scales all over with a blue feathery patch on his head that resembles hair, along with a smaller tuft of it at the base of his tail. Well-toned and quite eager for new things to try. Works as an independent fisherman alongside his partner (in both business and pleasure):

Duncan Smythe, a 260cm Orca. Much more heavily built than Sabin, and with a "package" to match. It is not uncommon for him to work with nothing underneath his yellow waterproofs - and that's if he had them on at all - which is a policy he likes to "enforce" on Sabin. Despite his dominance in their relationship, he does care deeply for Sabin, who can count on Duncan to be there for him.
1453.title: Choose another Male

choices: It works, the catch is saved
It fails, more drastic "measures" are required
14532.content:
"Come on Sabin! These fish won't haul themselves up!" He hollered to his partner.

"I'm trying! But this winch is jammed! It's not gonna haul anything up!" The green lizard responded to the much larger black and white Orca, while trying to unstick the jammed machinery.

The rains were hitting hard at this point, not uncommon given the time of the day with both suns out in force. The waves too, were starting to build up.

"Okay! I think I found where the jam is!" Sabin cried out. And Duncan heard, since he was heading over to look.

Duncan may have had his yellow overcoat on, but it really didn't keep the rain out since he had it open, broadcasting the clear fact that he had absolutely no other article of clothing on. "So what is it!?"

"Right here! The ropes slipped out of the pulley!" Sabin replied. "I may be able to slide it back into place!"

"Alright, I'll help you!" Duncan moved behind the more completely dressed Sabin, pressing his hardening member into his back. "On the count of three, pull it down and back!"

"Got it!"

"Right! One! Two! Three!"
14532.title: "Work" with Duncan

info.brief_description: A world filled with various creatures of various walks of life.  A world of Macro.
info.description:
Enter, to witness a world where Anthropomorphic beings live side-by-side, as there very size changes thanks to a special company. New Giants may come, old ones may go. One thing for sure though, there will never be a dull moment here! With so much to choose from, in terms of size, muscle, fat, and just about anything else that can be thought up!

Now enter, and make it so.

Key Rules:

Scat, Watersports, and Herm are No-Go's. End of story.

Try to avoid the single sentence chapter, keep the meat on them.
